LanguageData.JRWEstemmenosuchus.label: Estemmenosuchus
LanguageData.JRWEstemmenosuchus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #038723-1858 [ESTEMMENOSUCHUS MIRABILIS] CODENAME: CROWN >829
A bizarre omnivorous synapsid that sports a pair of peculiar antlers atop its head. While not particularly aggressive these creatures can pack a powerful bite, and gore small creatures to death.
LanguageData.JRWEstemmenosuchus.tools.antlers.label: antlers
